name: tasktrove
description: TaskTrove is a self-hosted personal task and project management app with boards, lists, due dates, and tags in a straightforward interface.
features: Board organization: Organize work using boards for different projects or areas with customizable layouts.
List management: Create lists within boards to represent workflow stages or task categories.
Task cards: Add detailed task cards with descriptions, due dates, tags, and attachments for comprehensive tracking.
Drag and drop: Move tasks between lists and reorder priorities with intuitive drag-and-drop interactions.
Due date tracking: Set deadlines for tasks and receive visual indicators for upcoming and overdue items.
Tag system: Label tasks with custom tags for categorization, filtering, and quick identification.
Search and filter: Find tasks across all boards using search and filter by tags, dates, or status.
Task details: Add rich descriptions, checklists, and notes to tasks for complete context and requirements.
Simple interface: Navigate and manage tasks through a clean, distraction-free interface focused on productivity.
Personal workspace: Maintain a private task management system without external dependencies or accounts.
Archive completed: Archive finished tasks to keep boards clean while preserving historical records.
Quick add: Create new tasks rapidly with keyboard shortcuts and minimal required fields.
